Process GME Other Markets MS AS XML Data

Source: R/gme_download.R
gme_mb_as_xml_to_data.Rd

This function processes a GME Other Markets MS AS XML file and extracts structured data, converting it into a tidy data.table format. It dynamically parses all quantity fields, standardizes their names, and reshapes the data into long format.

Usage

gme_mb_as_xml_to_data(xml_file_path)

Arguments

xml_file_path

A string specifying the file path to the XML file containing quantity data.

Value

A data.table in long format with the following columns:

  • DATE: Date of the record (as a Date object).

  • MARKET: Market type, typically MS AS.

  • TIME: Hour/minutes of the record (datetime).

  • HOUR: Hour of the record (integer).

  • ZONE: Zone or region (e.g., CSUD, CALA).

  • VALUE: Numeric value of the quantity in MWh.

  • UNIT: Unit of the value, default is MWh.

Details

The function performs the following steps:

  1. Reads the XML file and locates all MS AS nodes.

  2. Extracts key fields (Data, Mercato, Ora) and dynamically captures all quantity-related fields.

  3. Converts commas in values to dots for numeric compatibility.

  4. Creates a wide-format data.table with standardized column names.

  5. Reshapes the data to a long format for better analysis and visualization.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Process an XML file
file_path <- "path/to/MB_PRiservaSecondaria.xml"
transit_data <- gme_mb_rs_xml_to_data(file_path)
head(transit_data)
} # }
